import React from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import Heading from "../Components/Heading"; function zomDashboard() { //Get Month const month = [ "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December", ]; const date = new Date(); let todayMonth = month[date.getMonth()]; let todayDate = date .toLocaleDateString("en-GB", { day: "numeric", month: "short", year: "numeric", }) .replace(/ /g, " "); const dates = (new Date() - 1); let mm = dates .toLocaleDateString("en-GB", { day: "numeric", month: "short", year: "numeric", }) .replace(/ /g, " "); return ( <>
); } export default zomDashboard;
